content: I think I'll use the baking soda and water paste to remove the soap scum, and the bleach solution to remove the mildew. I've used those methods before and they've worked well. By the way, I'm glad I finally got around to cleaning the grout between the tiles on the floor three weeks ago, it was really bugging me. It took me about an hour and a half to do the whole bathroom, but it looks so much better now.
